name: Knitted balls and cubes
description: With their soft edges, these knitted geometric shapes can be used for throw-and-catch games. You could also add spots to the cube shapes to make dice.
full_text: With their soft edges, these knitted geometric shapes can be used for throw-and-catch games. You could also add spots to the cube shapes to make dice. A donation from sales of the ball and cubes knitting patterns is made to the charity Sustain, which runs the Children’s Food Campaign to help improve children’s health, and their knowledge, understanding and enjoyment of good food, see: www.childrensfoodcampaign.org.uk
